attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are far too many violent and viscious criminals in our Prisons who are a constant drain on our economy and are of absolutely no use to the human life chain. The money saved by executing these parasites could be then used to help finance our NHS and compensate the victims of serious crime.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
